text: Kurbanicya untala amhi tumacyasathi allahacya nisanyampaiki tharavile ahe. Tyancyata tumacyasathi labha ahe, tevha tyanna ubhe karuna tyancyavara allahace nava ghya, maga jevha tyance anga jaminila lagela tevha te tumhihi kha ani goragariba va yacakanna ani jo yacaka nasela tyalahi kha'u ghala. Asa prakare amhi catuspada (paliva) pasunna tumacya adhina kele ahe, yasathi ki tumhi krtajnata vyakta karavi
